posts.post_title: T206 Jordan Piedmont350/460 Factory 42 PSA 1.5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling a T206 Tim Jordan Piedmont 350/460-42 graded by PSA 1.5 (fair). Creased on front, staining on back. Asking $SOLD which includes Priority Mail shipping/insurance.  Payment by Paypal. SOLD in comments takes precedence over PMs. Ask questions if unsure of condition from photos.

Thank you.

Michael
